languages.text: Сердце Кассии было раздроблено в пыль предательством возлюбленно{mf|го|й}. Содрогаясь от ужаса и избегая прикосновений холодной руки того, кто прежде звался Лорд-капитаном, она широко распахнула третий глаз и сгинула в чудовищной манифестации мощи Эмпиреев.

Cassia's heart was ground to dust by her lover's betrayal. Trembling in terror and avoiding the touch of the one she had once called her Lord Captain, she opened her Third Eye and disappeared in a horrendous manifestation of Empyrean might.
languages.original_text: Сердце Кассии было раздроблено в пыль предательством возлюбленно{mf|го|й}. Содрогаясь от ужаса и избегая прикосновений холодной руки того, кто прежде звался Лорд-капитаном, она широко распахнула третий глаз и сгинула в чудовищной манифестации мощи Эмпиреев.

traits.locale_text: Cassia's heart was ground to dust by the betrayal of her lover. Trembling in terror and avoiding the touch of the one she once called Lord Captain, she opened her Third Eye and disappeared in a horrendous manifestation of Empyrean might.

Cassia's heart was ground to dust by her lover's betrayal. Trembling in terror and avoiding the touch of the one she had once called her Lord Captain, she opened her Third Eye and disappeared in a horrendous manifestation of Empyrean might.

languages.text: 爱人的背叛令卡西娅心如死灰。她被吓得浑身发抖，试图躲避那曾被她称为“舰长大人”的人。她睁开了第三只眼，在至高天恐怖的伟力之中消失得无影无踪。
languages.original_text: Cassia's heart was ground to dust by her lover's betrayal. Trembling in terror and avoiding the touch of the one she had once called her Lord Captain, she opened her Third Eye and disappeared in a horrendous manifestation of Empyrean might.

traits.locale_text: 爱人的背叛令卡西娅心如死灰。她被吓得浑身发抖，试图躲避那曾被她称为“舰长大人”的人。她睁开了第三只眼，在至高天恐怖的伟力之中消失得无影无踪。

languages.text: Cassias Herz zerfiel durch den Verrat {mf|ihres|ihrer} Geliebten zu Staub. Sie zitterte vor Furcht und mied die Berührungen der Person, die sie einst ihren Lord Captain genannt hatte. Sie öffnete ihr drittes Auge und verschwand in einer grauenhaften Manifestation des Empyreums.
languages.original_text: Cassia's heart was ground to dust by her lover's betrayal. Trembling in terror and avoiding the touch of the one she had once called her Lord Captain, she opened her Third Eye and disappeared in a horrendous manifestation of Empyrean might.

traits.locale_text: Cassias Herz zerfiel durch den Verrat {mf|ihres|ihrer} Geliebten zu Staub. Sie zitterte vor Furcht und mied die Berührungen der Person, die sie einst ihren Lord Captain genannt hatte. Sie öffnete ihr drittes Auge und verschwand in einer grauenhaften Manifestation des Empyreums.

languages.text: Le cœur de Cassia fut réduit en miettes par la trahison de son amour. Tremblante de terreur et évitant tout contact avec {mf|celui|celle} qu'elle appelait autrefois {mf|son seigneur-capitaine|sa seigneure-capitaine}, elle ouvrit son troisième œil et disparut dans une terrifiante manifestation de puissance de l'Empyrée.
languages.original_text: Cassia's heart was ground to dust by her lover's betrayal. Trembling in terror and avoiding the touch of the one she had once called her Lord Captain, she opened her Third Eye and disappeared in a horrendous manifestation of Empyrean might.

traits.locale_text: Le cœur de Cassia fut réduit en miettes par la trahison de son amour. Tremblante de terreur et évitant tout contact avec {mf|celui|celle} qu'elle appelait autrefois {mf|son seigneur-capitaine|sa seigneure-capitaine}, elle ouvrit son troisième œil et disparut dans une terrifiante manifestation de puissance empyréenne.

languages.text: La traición de su amado rompió irreparablemente el corazón de Cassia. Temblando de terror y evitando que a quien había considerado su Lord Capitán la tocara, abrió su tercer ojo y desapareció en una horrorosa manifestación de poderío del Empíreo.
languages.original_text: Cassia's heart was ground to dust by her lover's betrayal. Trembling in terror and avoiding the touch of the one she had once called her Lord Captain, she opened her Third Eye and disappeared in a horrendous manifestation of Empyrean might.

traits.locale_text: La traición de su amado rompió irreparablemente el corazón de Cassia. Temblando de terror y evitando que a quien había considerado su Lord Capitán la tocara, abrió su tercer ojo y desapareció en una horrorosa manifestación de poderío del Empíreo.

languages.text: カシアの心は恋人の裏切りによって土にかえった。恐怖に震え、かつてロード・キャプテンと呼んだ人に触れられるのを避けながら、第三の目を開いた彼女は、エンピリアンの力が恐るべき姿を顕す中で姿を消した。
languages.original_text: Cassia's heart was ground to dust by her lover's betrayal. Trembling in terror and avoiding the touch of the one she had once called her Lord Captain, she opened her Third Eye and disappeared in a horrendous manifestation of Empyrean might.

traits.locale_text: カシアの心は恋人の裏切りによって土にかえった。恐怖に震え、かつてロード・キャプテンと呼んだ人に触れられるのを避けながら、第三の目を開いた彼女は、エンピリアンの力が恐るべき姿を顕す中で姿を消した。

languages.text: Cassia'nın kalbi, âşığının ihanetiyle parçalanıp toz oldu. Korkudan tir tir titrer hâlde, bir zamanlar Lord Kaptan dediği kişinin dokunuşundan kaçarak üçüncü gözünü açtı ve Gök Diyar'ın kudretinin dehşet dolu bir tezahüründe yok oldu.
languages.original_text: Cassia's heart was ground to dust by her lover's betrayal. Trembling in terror and avoiding the touch of the one she had once called her Lord Captain, she opened her Third Eye and disappeared in a horrendous manifestation of Empyrean might.

traits.locale_text: Cassia'nın kalbi, âşığının ihanetiyle parçalanıp toz oldu. Korkudan tir tir titreyen bir hâlde ve bir zamanlar Lord Kaptan'ı olan kişinin dokunuşundan kaçarak Üçüncü Göz'ünü açtı ve Gök Diyar'ın kudretinin dehşet dolu bir tezahüründe yok oldu.
